Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory862.jpg'}
{1: 'Kowloong', 2: 'November 9, 22:10 (Earlier)', 4: '1200m under Kowloong, Somewhere'}
{3: 'Within the pitch darkness, a tall wall constructed of light and shadow looms, displaying a continuous stream of data and images.'}
{3: 'A slender figure stands alone, facing this towering structure.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'Huaxu, report the situation.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: "As of now... there haven't been any notable spikes in Punishing Virus reactions within the former Kowloong Corp's jurisdiction."}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: "Within the former Kowloong Chamber of Commerce's jurisdiction, signals other than the Punishing wavelengths cannot be detected in 64% of the Hexabridge Port areas."}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Can we trace the source?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'Some relevant information samples were intercepted when the Light Wall was activated.'}

{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'Out of all the targets taken out by the Light Wall, 84.2% exhibited Punishing biological traits—namely Hetero-Creatures, with 35.7% resembling chordates and 31% resembling arthropods...'}
{3: "Qu faces the towering wall, quietly listening to Huaxu's report."}
{3: 'From one war to another, from steel monsters flashing a red glow to Punishing creatures made of pure "flesh"...'}
{3: 'All she has witnessed is parting, crying, death, and ceaseless suffering.'}
{3: 'Suffering is meaningless.'}
{3: 'Everything now is nothing different from what she saw decades ago.'}
{3: 'War never changes.'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'Apart from that, only 15.7% of the targets eliminated displayed traits of Corrupted inorganic entities—'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'What about the remaining 0.1%?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'These losses were unavoidable when the Light Wall was activated.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Were those people's data scanned?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'Scanning is impossible without signal repeaters on the periphery.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Which means their mind data can't be uploaded to Tabula Akasha.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'Correct.'}
{3: 'Before Qu, the outcome outside the trillion-degree energy field of the Light Wall manifests as stark, unfeeling numbers.'}
{3: 'Yet behind these numbers lies their tenacious will to survive—even as they opted to confront death.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Then can we trace the source of these "Hetero-Creatures" and Corrupted?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: "According to the signal detection findings, it's only confirmed that these Punishing entities all came from the ocean beyond the auxiliary city of Hexabridge Port."}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'The origin of these biologically characterized "Hetero-Creatures" remains unclear.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'The report from Heng Ji mentions that these "Hetero-Creatures" exhibit organizational behaviors, a fact also supported by the current battle scenarios.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'However, as of now, no leader figure has been detected among these organized Hetero-Creatures.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "It's like fighting a war blindfolded.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'I will continue to search and deduce any entity that exhibits such traits—'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'Bzzzz... bzzzz...'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab'}
{3: "The once orderly flow of data and images on the towering wall suddenly flickers and trembles with Huaxu's voice becoming distorted, only to swiftly return to its normal state."}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'What happened?', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Huaxu', 3: "Captured an unconventional high-frequency intrusive signal. This signal comprises multiple decoding units and possesses high power, leading to a temporary surge in Huaxu's load, which is now restored to normal."}
{2: 'Qu', 3: '...Are the cyberattacks against us still happening?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'Yes.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "How's Tabula Akasha?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'Currently, all sectors of Tabula Akasha remain unaffected by the Punishing Virus and cyberattacks, and the surface protective barriers are holding steady.'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: "All units are functioning normally. Huaxu's firewall operates with a separate load, independent of the Tabula Akasha sectors."}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'If the load gets too heavy, stop the special simulation I requested earlier.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Prioritize the safety of Tabula Akasha and ensure you have enough computing power to maintain its operation.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'Understood.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryShuju.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Heng Ji, Fuxi Crew', 3: 'Lady Qu.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'With a ripple of azure data fluctuations, Heng Ji, now in a digitized form, appears next to Qu.'}

{2: 'Heng Ji, Fuxi Crew', 3: 'According to reports from outside, following the activation of the Light Wall, those Hetero-Creatures disintegrated into a liquid-like substance and infiltrated the underground of Hexabridge Port.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Were they decomposed by the Light Wall?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Heng Ji, Fuxi Crew', 3: 'In conclusion... yes.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'So the wall can only destroy the physical structure of Hetero-Creatures but not the Punishing Virus itself.'}
{2: 'Heng Ji, Fuxi Crew', 3: 'This plan instructed by Huaxu seems to have failed.', 4: '2'}
{3: "Qu's dark green hair seems unusually weighty beneath the illumination of the ever-flowing data wall, while her already profound eyes now shimmer with a chilly glow."}
{2: 'Heng Ji, Fuxi Crew', 3: "What's the next step, Lady Qu?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "You may leave for now. Tabula Akasha still needs you to take on some of Huaxu's responsibilities.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Heng Ji, Fuxi Crew', 3: 'I understand, but those people outside are still trapped in Hexabridge Port.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Heng Ji, Fuxi Crew', 3: "The waterways for the Nighter outside are obstructed as well. If we don't find a solution—", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'I have my own plan.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Heng Ji, Fuxi Crew', 3: '...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Heng Ji, Fuxi Crew', 3: 'Understood—', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Heng Ji, Fuxi Crew', 3: 'Lady Qu?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Document the names of everyone who died in this tragedy, whether they were victims or martyrs.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Heng Ji, Fuxi Crew', 3: 'Yes, Lady Qu.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Heng Ji, Fuxi Crew', 3: "Then... I'll take my leave.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryShuju.prefab', 4: '2'}
{3: "Heng Ji's figure fades away, leaving Qu alone once more."}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'You heard it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'With your authorization, the target number of simulations has been adjusted based on current variables...'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'The adjusted target number of simulations is approximately 1.75x10^45.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Still astronomical.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'Compared to the number of possibilities before the reactivation of the Light Wall, the number has diminished by over ten orders of magnitude.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Let's proceed to the next step.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: '...Are you sure you want to execute this action?'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'Within the disturbance range of this simulation target, the probability of achieving the desired confidence interval remains below one in 137.'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'In other words, even among 1.75x10^45 possibilities, achieving the target interval still necessitates an additional one in 137 ideal confidence conditions.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Didn't you see? The Gray Raven Commandant, that Chief, is also here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: '【kuroname】 cannot become a simulation variable because they cannot be precisely measured.'}
{3: 'On one of the screens on the data wall, that person is displayed.'}
{3: 'The last encounter Qu had with this human in person was on the Observatory, only to end in a confrontation.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Let's do what we must.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'Before that, I must warn you.'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'The prime command you previously gave was to prioritize the safety of Tabula Akasha at any expense.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'This prime command was not only given to you but to myself as well.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'Can I interpret that after opening the protective barriers beneath the inner area, this command still stands?'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Yes, Huaxu. It's still the same, for you and for me.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: '...Understood.'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'I will still prioritize the safety of Tabula Akasha "at any expense."'}
{3: "Huaxu's voice echoes in Qu's ears, but her profound gaze remains fixed on the screen showing the figure of 【kuroname】."}
{3: 'It seems that 【kuroname】 survived the seemingly suicide bombing without much harm and is currently guiding the survivors alongside Pulao and Chaofeng toward evacuation in the north port area.'}
{3: "The Hetero-Creatures, with unknown origins, have surged through Kowloong like lightning, extinguishing people's hope for survival."}
{3: 'Everything has happened too fast, way too fast.'}
{3: "Numerous people didn't even have the opportunity to scream before being engulfed by the rushing blood-red tide."}
{3: 'Even the Light Wall proves incapable of entirely eradicating the Punishing Virus, a relentless devourer, as those who altruistically sacrifice themselves to repel it fall one by one.'}
{3: 'Countless people, dead or alive, will gather here until the end of the world.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Prepare to send a comms request, Huaxu.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Duheng should still be alive. Contact her. I want to speak with them.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Open the protective barriers beneath the inner area and assign all computing power, excluding that of Tabula Akasha, to protect the people.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Allow entry into Tabula Akasha for anyone willing to do so and for anyone seeking survival.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Additionally, the thing I asked Heng Ji to document must also be completed.', 4: '1'}
{1: '...Voiceprint signature confirmed, Monarch of Kowloong.', 2: 'ff4e4eff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: 'Now opening the dome barriers from Renxu A to Renyi T within Tabula Akasha.', 2: 'ff4e4eff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 10: '1'}

{1: 'In approximately... 12 minutes, the dome barriers within the designated areas will be deactivated, and the rail system will be established.', 2: 'ff4e4eff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 10: '1'}

{1: 'In 55 minutes, the impact of the Punishing Virus will reach the surface protective barriers of Tabula Akasha.', 2: 'ff4e4eff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 10: '1'}

{1: 'In 1 hour and 7 minutes, the impact of the Punishing Virus will reach the central protective barriers of Tabula Akasha.', 2: 'ff4e4eff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 10: '1'}

{1: 'In 1 hour and 46 minutes, the first wave of the Punishing Virus will reach the physical layer of Tabula Akasha.', 2: 'ff4e4eff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: '...Following that...', 2: 'ff4e4eff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: "In 3 hours and 36 minutes, Huaxu's firewall will be breached by the Punishing Virus.", 2: 'ff4e4eff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: "In 4 hours and 52 minutes, Huaxu's computing core will be breached by the Punishing Virus.", 2: 'ff4e4eff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 10: '1'}

{1: 'In 6 hours and 18 minutes, the logical destruction rate of all sectors in the data layer of Tabula Akasha will reach 50%.', 2: 'ff4e4eff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 10: '1'}

{1: 'In 6 hours and 23 minutes, the logical destruction rate of all sectors in the data layer of Tabula Akasha will reach the 90% self-termination threshold.', 2: 'ff4e4eff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 10: '1'}

{1: 'In approximately... 6 hours and 42 minutes, the Tabula Akasha city beneath the former Kowloong Corp will be completely overtaken by the Punishing Virus.', 2: 'ff4e4eff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 8: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: 'Simultaneously, it will mark the failure of Project Tabula Akasha.', 2: 'ff4e4eff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 9: '1', 10: '1'}
{3: 'Upon receiving the command, Huaxu promptly projects a prominent countdown on the data wall.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'That crimson hue seems to unfold before her eyes once more, where the past, present, and future intertwine in a tapestry of the Punishing Virus, blood, fire, and—'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Sunset for Kowloong.', 4: '1'}
